channel.title: Posts on Connor Martin
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Connor Martin

item.title: Bandit Coffee and Matcha
item.description: Bandit is a new coffee and matcha shop on North Lamar just past the river. Bandit has a wide selection of drinks and pastries to choose from along with a Lamar-facing patio to enjoy them on. Upon arrival they ask that you either download their app or use a provided kiosk to place your order in an attempt to maintain a contactless transaction which was highly appreciated. Pictured (left to right) is an iced matcha latte, a hot latte, and an iced honey lavender matcha latte accompanied by a chocolate crescent and a blueberry doughnut.

item.title: FoodHeads
item.description: FoodHeads is a mostly outdoor sandwich spot on North Guadalupe that features large sandwiches, iced tea, and made-in-kitchen soups. If you ever needed a reason to go get some rainy day comfort food, this is it. FoodHeads features a comfortable, quiet outdoor seating area where you can listen to birds nesting in a nearby birdhouse while you enjoy their food. What drew me into this place was their Barbecue Bahn Mi (pictured).

item.title: Try Hard Coffee
item.description: Try Hard Coffee is currently undergoing some renivations, due to which they are currently serving their coffee out of a pop-up tent across the street in a local food truck park. Regardless of where they are serving their coffee, they have a very interesting and unique selection of drinks to select from. Pictured is one latte, one iced latte, and a coffee cola (left to right) along with two cream puff pasteries.
